name: Meet your Girls
description:
April is the official women’s month in Mozambique, thereunder, in order to promote greater equality of opportunities for women in tech, GDG Maputo and Muthiana Code (women focused developers group) intend to organize an event composed of a tech talk and keynotes.

In order to participate on the event, please fill out this form.

name: GDG Maputo DevFest 2017
description: GDG-Maputo DevFest aims to bring together different experts on Google leading technologies (such as Firebase, Android, Progressive web apps, Machine Learning, etc) to interact with developers, entrepreneurs and students on a day long event composed of tech-talks, codelabs and 1 to 1 sessions that will further, help the participants understand and select the tools best suited for them to build fast, scalable and secure tech based solutions.

name: Debugging Web Apps with the Chrome Dev Tools
description:
• What we'll do
Together we'll learn how to use the Developer Tools provided by Google Chrome to help us finding and fixing errors in web applications.

• What to bring : laptop with chrome installed

• Important to know : minimum knowledge of web applications(html, css,js) is required to fully enjoy the session, however , we also encourage the presence of attendees who are not familiar with these technologies to show up so they can get a head-start when they start working with them

name: GDG Maputo Cloud Study Jams
description:
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin?
Join us for our Cloud Study Jam! Together we'll work through three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs, then you will get free access to the next quest so you can finish this series of labs at home to get a Google-hosted badge for your online profile. You will be able to get hands-on experience with Docker, Kubernetes and Scientific Data Processing, which will earn you additional badges.
Join this meetup to get official Google training, a $70+ value, free of charge.
Bring a laptop (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed.

Agenda:

09:00AM : Welcome and Introductions
09:30AM : Creating a Virtual Machine
10:00AM : Provision Services with Cloud Launcher
10:30AM : Creating a Persistent Disk (Activity Tracking)
11:00AM : Snack Break
11:30AM : Introduction to Docker
12:00AM : Networking & Next Steps

Register here: https://goo.gl/forms/A2vBZFMfj8RmXd5j1

name: IWD Maputo 2018
description:
We are proud to be hosting the 2018 International Women's Day Celebration, a women's tech conference. This event will highlight the stories of our growing female community of designers, developers, and technology entrepreneurs.

Together, we'll se how to Build a New Horizon.

03:00PM - 03:15PM - Attendees Arrival
03:15PM - 04:00PM - Public Speaking 101 + Q&A (15min)
04:00PM - 04:15PM - Break
04:15PM - 05:45PM - Getting Started with Android Things (Malika Ibraimo)
05:45PM - 06:00PM - Networking
how_to_find_us: Perto do ISCTEM, atrás das bombas da Total da 25 de Setembro.

name: WTM Girls Talk
description:
We'll have a discussion on "How to use technology to change the world" followed by a session about Firebase Hosting.

Agenda:
09:00 - Opening
09:15 - How to use technology to change the world - Video from Google I/O 2018
10:15 - Break
11:00 - Building Fast Web Experiences with Firebase Hosting
how_to_find_us: Próximo ao ISCTEM, enfrente ao Barclays. Atrás das bombas Total da 25 de Setembro (perto do repinga).

name: I/O 2018 Recap
description:
We'll be looking back at the new technologies introduced by Google at the I/O 2018.

Event Agenda:
09:00 - Watch the Google I/O 2018 Developer Keynote
10:00 - Flutter Talk
10:45 - Q&A
11:00 - Discussion on the recently introduced technologies
11:30 - Snacks and event ending
how_to_find_us: The incubator is next to ISCTEM. Infront of the Barclays bank

name: I/O Extended Maputo 2018
description: I/O Extended 2018 Maputo is an event that aims to put together the developers community in Mozambique and some stakeholders from the private sector to let them discuss and learn about the new technologies introduced at Google I/O 2018.
how_to_find_us: A Incubadora fica por trás das bombas Total da 25 de Setembro. Enfrente ao Barclays.

name: Build Actions For Your Community - Maputo
description:
• What we'll do
“Build Actions for Your Community” is an event series designed to help developers get a better understanding of the Google Assistant.
In this Meetup you'll get an overview of what the Google Assistant is and how to get started with it.

• What to bring
Laptop

• Important to know

name: Build Actions For Your Community 2 - Maputo
description:
“Build Actions for Your Community” is an event series designed to help developers get a better understanding of the Google Assistant.
In this Meetup you'll get an overview of what the Google Assistant is and how to get started with it.
how_to_find_us: A Incubadora fica por trás das bombas Total da 25 de Setembro. Enfrente ao Barclays.

name: Becoming World Class Developer
description:
We'll have a discussion with Dario Mungoi - a Google Developer Expert for Android, born in Mozambique, currently working at Shopify (Canada). He'll be talking about what skills do developers need to succeed in their career and will also be giving some tips based on his experience.
This session aims to inspire developers and give them a little push on a successful career.
Target Audience:

- IT Students
- Developers
- Computer Enthusiasts
how_to_find_us: A Incubadora ficar por trás das bombas Total da 25 de Setembro.

name: Machine Learning Study Jam - Maputo
description:
New to Machine Learning but don’t know where to start? Join us for a Machine Learning Study Jam where we will run through the Machine Learning Crash Course (MLCC)!

This course is intended for those who wish to learn about ML from a practical, applied perspective that will enable you to use machine learning in your everyday projects and learn about the power of TensorFlow. This is a great opportunity for anyone with basic technical knowledge and limited Machine Learning knowledge willing to gain some practical experience in ML and TensorFlow.

**Bring your laptop!**
how_to_find_us: A Incubadora fica por trás das bombas Total da 25 de Setembro. Enfrente ao Barclays

name: Next '18 Extended Maputo
description:
Next Extended brings together developer communities around the world to take part in the Next ‘18 experience, either during the conference or even after!

Agenda:
09:00 - 9:10 Event Opening
9:10 - 10:40 Made Here Together - Developer Keynote
10:40 - 11:25 Firebase Overview
11:25 - 12:10 Snack Break
12:10 - 14:00 Machine Learning with GCP
how_to_find_us: Por trás das bombas Total da 25 de Setembro. Próximo ao ISCTEM

name: Flutter Study Jam Maputo
description:
Flutter is Google’s mobile app SDK for crafting high-quality native interfaces on iOS and Android in record time. Flutter works with existing code, is used by developers and organizations around the world, and is free and open source.

Want to get started on building Flutter apps?

Join us for our Flutter Study Jam! Together we'll work through Flutter Udacity Course prepared by Google instructors. You will be able to get hands-on experience with Flutter and build a Flutter app while learning the fundamentals..

Bring a laptop! The course will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, the laptop should have Flutter installed on it prior to starting the study jam to save time. Windows/Linux/Mac would all be fine. Check out : https://flutter.io/get-started/install/

Agenda:
9:00am: Flutter Udacity Course Introduction
9:30am: Udacity Course Lesson 1
11:30Am: Break
12:30pm: Udacity Course Lesson 1 continue
2:00pm: Event ends
how_to_find_us: Atrás das bombas da Total da 25 de Setembro, próximo à clínica dentária do ISCTEM.

name: DevFest Maputo 2018
description:
GDG DevFest 2018 is our annual all-day developer conference that offers speaker sessions across multiple product areas, codelabs, hackathon and more!

MORE DETAILS:
https://devfestmaputo.firebaseapp.com

name: Consumindo REST APIs em aplicativos móveis
description:
No nosso primeiro evento do ano iremos aprender a consumir REST APIs no Android e no Flutter.

AGENDA
17:00 - Chegada dos Participantes
17:30 - Início do evento
17:45 - REST APIs no Android usando Retrofit - Ivan Bila
18:30 - REST APIs no Flutter - Helênio Vasconcelos
19:15 - Networking

Não é necessário trazer laptop.
how_to_find_us:
Atrás das bombas da Total da 25 de Setembro, enfrente ao Barclays.
Próximo à clínica dentária do ISCTEM.

name: Cloud Study Jam Maputo
description:
Queres aprender a utilizar o Google Cloud, mas não sabes por onde começar?
Junta-te ao nosso Cloud Study Jam!
Ganharás treinamento oficial da Google, (que vale mais do que $55), gratuitamente. Juntos vamos completar alguns dos exercícios, que oferecem experiência prática com a Cloud Console, Kubernetes, Segurança, IoT na Cloud e Machine Learning.

Depois da nossa sessão, terás acesso gratuito à mais exercícios para completar em casa. Complete todos os exercícios para ganhar uma medalha da Google para o seu perfil online, e mais 1 mês grátis na plataforma.

Traga o seu laptop(PC, Mac ou Chromebook) e carregador! Os exercícios funcionam em todos os navegadores(browsers) mais populares. Para uma melhor experiência, recomendamos que tenha Firefox ou Chrome instalado. Não esqueça o seu carregador.
how_to_find_us: Atrás das bombas da Total da 25 de Setembro, enfrente ao Barclays. Próximo à clínica dentária do ISCTEM.
